list_definition.definition: to come upon or meet with accidentally or after searching

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: I found that I couldn’t do the work.

list_definition.definition: to consider; to think (something) to be

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: I found the British weather very cold.

list_definition.mean_english: vật tìm thấy, nhất là vật có giá trị hoặc dễ chịu
list_definition.definition: something found, especially something of value or interest

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: That old book is quite a find!
